params.limit: is a number of NFTs to check per function's call
params.offset: is a starting ordinal number of user's NFT
params.policyBooksAddresses: is an array of PolicyBooks to check the stakes in
params.staker: is a user to return information for

returns.nftsCount: - number of NFTs for each respective PolicyBook
returns.nftsInfo: - 2 dimensional array of NFTs info per each PolicyBook     (nftIndex, uri, stakedBMIXAmount, stakedSTBLAmount, reward (in BMI))
returns.policyBooksInfo: - an array of infos (totalStakedSTBL, rewardPerBlock (in BMI), stakingAPY, liquidityAPY)
returns.usersInfo: - an array of user's info per PolicyBook (totalStakedBMIX, totalStakedSTBL, totalBmiReward)
